TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7456=Version 3.4 was released September 19, which is the same day as 10.8.2, so I suspect the last 10.8.1 compatible version was 3.3.2, released July 25.}
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Thanks, -Najinsky Obviously this won't solve my library issue, but it will let me use a better release with my new photos I'm waiting to process, while waiting for Apple to sort the mess out. Version 3.4 was released September 19, which is the same day as 10.8.2, so I suspect the last 10.8.1 compatible version was 3.3.2, released July 25. I'd appreciate if, anyone has a link to the updater for the latest version that is compatible, with 10.8.1. However, for Aperture, I downloaded the trial, and then used my serials from 2 and 3.
